channel.title: Some one should make lvl 1 pking server...?
channel.description: hi... i askin some java coder to make some lvl 1 pking server... server that has made only for low level pkin... just like piruonline was when it came out.. and if you guys agree mee please post somethink :) bdw when piruonline came it has alot players and it was growing everyday.. untill they made new update and its started to be like normal pk server--- and ppl started to quit it..

lol so u guys are the teachers here?? lol… so is this a fuckin english test that i have to pass??.. lol grow up!

item.title: Some one should make lvl 1 pking server...?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

auroa:

… Point of making a thread about it? If you want to make a shit server then go ahead. Not like anyone is going to join anyways.

F BaBy:

Omer, nobody would play a server like that, trust me.

So no-one liked low level PKing? In my honest opinion, it was the best of RSC. High level PKing was the boring part.
